name: wexample/symfony-loader-testing
description: A dynamic rendering system for Symfony

post-install-cmd: [ -f bin/console ] && php bin/console loader:check-node-install || echo 'Skipping console command (no Symfony app)'
post-update-cmd: [ -f bin/console ] && php bin/console loader:check-node-install || echo 'Skipping console command (no Symfony app)'
